start: ^Azis: Hey there hot stuff, seems you got a bit over your head last night?
^Kartoni: Oh, don't tell me about it...
^Azis: Anyways, I brought you here since I wanted to make sure you are okay.
^Kartoni: Thank you. By the way, do you have any idea where my things are? I found myself in this box when I woke up.
^Azis: Well, I am not exactly sure about this.
^Alright, do you have any other tips for me?
^Well, you brought me here. How don't you have any clue about this?!?
gets_coffee: ^Azis: Not tips, but I can give you this coffee to get you back on track. *Azis gives Kartoni coffee.*
no_coffee: ^Azis: WELL I DON'T, OKAY?!? YOU WERE LIKE THAT WHEN I FOUND YOU.
^Kartoni: Jeez, calm down. I don't have the energy to argue with you right now. See you...
